docs.text: OSC-EM Schemas Schemas for the Open Standards Community for Electron Microscopy (OSC-EM) URI: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas Available Schemas Schema Description General The general schema covering materials science and other use cases. SPA The single particle analysis focused schema. Subtomogram Averaging The molecular focused tomography schema, mainly for subtomogram averaging. Environmental Tomography A schema for environmental samples, more flexible sample descriptions. Cellular Tomography Schema for cellular or tissue samples, also with flexible sample descriptions.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Schemas for the Open Standards Community for Electron Microscopy (OSC-EM) URI: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas

docs.text: Schema Description General The general schema covering materials science and other use cases. SPA The single particle analysis focused schema. Subtomogram Averaging The molecular focused tomography schema, mainly for subtomogram averaging. Environmental Tomography A schema for environmental samples, more flexible sample descriptions. Cellular Tomography Schema for cellular or tissue samples, also with flexible sample descriptions.

docs.text: oscem-schemas-cellular-tomo Schema for the Open Standards Community for Electron Microscopy (OSC-EM) URI: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-cellular-tomo Name: CellularTomography Classes Class Description Acquisition General acquisition covering materials science and other use cases AcquisitionSpa AcquisitionTomo AcquisitionCelTomo AcquisitionEnvTomo AcquisitionSubTomo Any Any type, used as the base for type-narrowing BoundingBox2D an axis-aligned 2D bounding box (float units) ChromaticAberrationCorrector Special device used to correct instrument inherent chromatic aberration Descriptor List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how mi... Descriptors Detector Class representing a detector EMDatasetBase OSC-EM Metadata for a dataset EMDatasetCell Cryo electron tomography dataset of a cellular sample, lab grown EnergyFilter A device used to filter for electrons with specific energy Freezing how the sample was frozen Funder Description of the project funding Grant Grant GrowthCondition How the cells were grown ImageSize size of a 2D image (in integer units) Instrument Instrument values, mostly constant across a data collection Microscope Microscope information Organizational Overarching category for authors and grants Person personal information Author Details on the person performing the experiment Phaseplate Used to modulate the phase of the electron wave QuantityValue if a value has a unit, it should be given as a unit value pair QuantitySI unit value extended to have two additional fields si_value and si_unit Range A range constructed from min and max Series A series of numbers constructed from min, max, and increment TiltAngle The min, max and increment of the tilt angle in a tomography session SampleEnv Unifying class to describe the full sample SampleCell Unifying class to describe the full sample with growth conditions SpecialistOptics Optional optics used to correct for instrument limitations SpecimenEnv base information on the acquisition and treatment of the sample itself SphericalAberrationCorrector Special device used to correct instrument inherent spherical aberration Thinning how the frozen sample was thinned by i TomogramFeatures what was the target of the tomograms, and what area of a cell do they cover Slots Slot Description acceleration_voltage Voltage used for the electron acceleration, in kV acquisition atmosphere What was the atmosphere the sample was in right before freezing, elaborate on... atmosphere_growth What was the atmosphere the sample was in, elaborate on any special gases pre... authors List of authors associated with the project beam_convergence Refers to how tightly or widely the electron beam is focused onto the sample,... beamshift Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does ... beamtilt Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes th... beamtiltgroups Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing ... binning_camera Level of binning on the images applied during data collection blotting whether blotting was performed budget budget c2_aperture C2 aperture size used in data acquisition, in µm calibrated_defocus Machine estimated defocus, min and max values in µm calibrated_magnification Calculated magnification, no unit cell_cycle What was the targeted cell cycle state, if any cellular_features What type of cellular features are present in your tomograms? chromatic_aberration_corrector Specialist device to correct for chromatic aberration of the microscope lense... collection_angle Collection angle set, min and max values in mrad collection_date When the sample was collected country Country of the institution cryogen Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen cryogen_sample_env the cryogen used to freeze the sample, i cs Spherical aberration of the instrument, in mm date_time Time and date of the data acquisition description The description of the item descriptor_name Name defining the descriptor descriptor_thing Description of the descriptor descriptors List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how mo... details Any further comments on the freezing process go here details_tomo If you have any further comments on your tomograms please leave them here detectors dispersion Dispersion of an analytical detector, in eV dose_per_movie Average dose per image/movie/tilt - given in electrons per square Angstrom electron_source Type of electron source used in the microscope, such as FEG email email end_date end date energy_filter Whether an energy filter was used and its specifics exposure_time Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s family_name last name frames_per_movie Number of frames that on average constitute a full movie, can be a bit hard t... freezing funder funding organization/person funder_name funding organization/person gainref_flip_rotate Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with... given_name first name grant_name name of the grant grants List of grants associated with the project grids_imaged Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this dat... growth_condition How the specimen was grown growth_location In/on what kind of surface/container the cells were grown; i handling What was done to the sample, please give an overview of relevant treatments height The height of a given item - unit depends on item holder Speciman holder model holder_cryogen Type of cryogen used in the holder - if the holder is cooled seperately humidity_env humidity of the atmosphere right before/ during freezing; in % illumination Mode of illumination used during data collection image_size The size of the image in pixels, height and width given images_generated Number of images generated total for this data collection - might need a qual... imageshift Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detec... imaging Mode of imaging used during data collection increment Increment between elements of a series instrument instrument_thin Instrument used for thinning the sample instrument_type Details of a given specialist instrument ion_source what ion source was used? job_title job title lift_out whether a lift out was performed location the geographical location of your source, optimally in a geographic coordinat... main_target What was the main biological target of your research for this tomogram? manufacturer The name of the manufacturer maximal Maximal value of a given dataset property information microscope_software Software used for instrument control, minimal Minimal value of a given dataset property mode Mode of the detector, e model The model of the item name The name of the specialist_optics Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate specimen_env spherical_aberration_corrector Specialist device to correct for spherical aberration of the microscope lense... tilt_angle The min, max and increment of the tilt angle in a tomography session tilt_axis_angle The tilt axis angle of a tomography series tissue if the sample is a tissue sample please indicate what type of tissue tomogram_features treatment Were there any special treatment conditions; such as addition of certain chem... type_org Type of organization, academic, commercial, governmental, etc unit docs.text: Class: Acquisition General acquisition covering materials science and other use cases. For specialized techniques, use the appropriate subclass (AcquisitionSpa for single particle, or tomography subclasses). docs.text: oscem-schemas-env-tomo Schema for the Open Standards Community for Electron Microscopy (OSC-EM) URI: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo Name: EnvironmentalTomography Classes Class Description Acquisition General acquisition covering materials science and other use cases AcquisitionSpa AcquisitionTomo AcquisitionCelTomo AcquisitionEnvTomo AcquisitionSubTomo Any Any type, used as the base for type-narrowing BoundingBox2D an axis-aligned 2D bounding box (float units) ChromaticAberrationCorrector Special device used to correct instrument inherent chromatic aberration Descriptor List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how mi... Descriptors Detector Class representing a detector EMDatasetBase OSC-EM Metadata for a dataset EMDatasetEnv Cryo electron tomography dataset of an environmental sample EnergyFilter A device used to filter for electrons with specific energy Freezing how the sample was frozen Funder Description of the project funding Grant Grant ImageSize size of a 2D image (in integer units) Instrument Instrument values, mostly constant across a data collection Microscope Microscope information Organizational Overarching category for authors and grants Person personal information Author Details on the person performing the experiment Phaseplate Used to modulate the phase of the electron wave QuantityValue if a value has a unit, it should be given as a unit value pair QuantitySI unit value extended to have two additional fields si_value and si_unit Range A range constructed from min and max Series A series of numbers constructed from min, max, and increment TiltAngle The min, max and increment of the tilt angle in a tomography session SampleEnv Unifying class to describe the full sample SpecialistOptics Optional optics used to correct for instrument limitations SpecimenEnv base information on the acquisition and treatment of the sample itself SphericalAberrationCorrector Special device used to correct instrument inherent spherical aberration Thinning how the frozen sample was thinned by i TomogramFeatures what was the target of the tomograms, and what area of a cell do they cover Slots Slot Description acceleration_voltage Voltage used for the electron acceleration, in kV acquisition atmosphere What was the atmosphere the sample was in right before freezing, elaborate on... authors List of authors associated with the project beam_convergence Refers to how tightly or widely the electron beam is focused onto the sample,... beamshift Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does ... beamtilt Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes th... beamtiltgroups Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing ... binning_camera Level of binning on the images applied during data collection blotting whether blotting was performed budget budget c2_aperture C2 aperture size used in data acquisition, in µm calibrated_defocus Machine estimated defocus, min and max values in µm calibrated_magnification Calculated magnification, no unit cellular_features What type of cellular features are present in your tomograms? chromatic_aberration_corrector Specialist device to correct for chromatic aberration of the microscope lense... collection_angle Collection angle set, min and max values in mrad collection_date When the sample was collected country Country of the institution cryogen Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen cryogen_sample_env the cryogen used to freeze the sample, i cs Spherical aberration of the instrument, in mm date_time Time and date of the data acquisition description The description of the item descriptor_name Name defining the descriptor descriptor_thing Description of the descriptor descriptors List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how mo... details Any further comments on the freezing process go here details_tomo If you have any further comments on your tomograms please leave them here detectors dispersion Dispersion of an analytical detector, in eV dose_per_movie Average dose per image/movie/tilt - given in electrons per square Angstrom electron_source Type of electron source used in the microscope, such as FEG email email end_date end date energy_filter Whether an energy filter was used and its specifics exposure_time Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s family_name last name frames_per_movie Number of frames that on average constitute a full movie, can be a bit hard t... freezing funder funding organization/person funder_name funding organization/person gainref_flip_rotate Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with... given_name first name grant_name name of the grant grants List of grants associated with the project grids_imaged Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this dat... handling What was done to the sample, please give an overview of relevant treatments height The height of a given item - unit depends on item holder Speciman holder model holder_cryogen Type of cryogen used in the holder - if the holder is cooled seperately humidity_env humidity of the atmosphere right before/ during freezing; in % illumination Mode of illumination used during data collection image_size The size of the image in pixels, height and width given images_generated Number of images generated total for this data collection - might need a qual... imageshift Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detec... imaging Mode of imaging used during data collection increment Increment between elements of a series instrument instrument_thin Instrument used for thinning the sample instrument_type Details of a given specialist instrument ion_source what ion source was used? job_title job title lift_out whether a lift out was performed location the geographical location of your source, optimally in a geographic coordinat... main_target What was the main biological target of your research for this tomogram? manufacturer The name of the manufacturer maximal Maximal value of a given dataset property method freezing method - such as plunge freezing, high pressure freezing etc method_thin The thinning method used, such as FIB milling microscope Microscope information microscope_software Software used for instrument control, minimal Minimal value of a given dataset property mode Mode of the detector, e model The model of the item name The name of the item name_org Name of the organization nominal_defocus Target defocus set, min and max values in nm nominal_magnification Magnification level as indicated by the instrument, no unit operating_mode Operating mode of the microscope, i orcid ORCID of the author, a type of unique identifier organelles What organelles; if any; are present? organism the organism(s) present in your sample, if not perfectly defined try to asses... organizational person person phaseplate Phaseplate is a special optics device that can be used to enhance contrast pixel_size Pixel size, in Angstrom project_id project id role Role of the author, for example principal investigator sample screen_current The total electron beam current hitting the viewing screen, in nA source_env where is this sample from? i specialist_optics Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate specimen_env spherical_aberration_corrector Specialist device to correct for spherical aberration of the microscope lense... start_date start date target_thickness What was the target thickness of the lamella; in nm technique Specifies which Acquisition subschema/class is in use telephone work phone temperature_env temperature of the sample right before freezing; in K temperature_range Temperature during data collection, in K with min and max values thinning tilt_angle The min, max and increment of the tilt angle in a tomography session tilt_axis_angle The tilt axis angle of a tomography series tissue if the sample is a tissue sample please indicate what type of tissue tomogram_features type_org Type of organization, academic, commercial, governmental, etc unit the unit of a given value unitSI the SI unit attached to a si value used whether a specific instrument was used during data acquisition value the value of a field with a unit valueSI value of a given field in respect to its SI unit width The width of a given item - unit depends on item width_energy_filter Width of the energy filter used x_max maximum x x_min minimum x y_max maximum y y_min minimum y Enumerations Enumeration Description AcquisitionTechnique FreezingMethodEnum Allowed freezing options OrganizationTypeEnum Allowed values for authors organizations Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description

docs.text: Class: Acquisition General acquisition covering materials science and other use cases. For specialized techniques, use the appropriate subclass (AcquisitionSpa for single particle, or tomography subclasses). URI: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo/Acquisition erDiagram Acquisition { string technique integer nominal_magnification integer calibrated_magnification string holder string holder_cryogen string microscope_software datetime date_time string cryogen integer frames_per_movie integer grids_imaged integer images_generated integer beamtiltgroups string gainref_flip_rotate } BoundingBox2D { } ChromaticAberrationCorrector { boolean used string instrument_type } Detector { string name string mode } EnergyFilter { boolean used string model } ImageSize { integer height integer width } Phaseplate { boolean used string instrument_type } QuantitySI { float valueSI string unitSI string unit float value } Range { } SpecialistOptics { } SphericalAberrationCorrector { boolean used string instrument_type } Acquisition ||--|o BoundingBox2D : "beamshift" Acquisition ||--|o BoundingBox2D : "beamtilt" Acquisition ||--|o BoundingBox2D : "imageshift" Acquisition ||--|o EnergyFilter : "energy_filter" Acquisition ||--|o ImageSize : "image_size" Acquisition ||--|o QuantitySI : "dose_per_movie" Acquisition ||--|o QuantitySI : "exposure_time" Acquisition ||--|o QuantitySI : "screen_current" Acquisition ||--|o Range : "calibrated_defocus" Acquisition ||--|o Range : "nominal_defocus" Acquisition ||--|o Range : "temperature_range" Acquisition ||--|o SpecialistOptics : "specialist_optics" Acquisition ||--|| ImageSize : "binning_camera" Acquisition ||--|| QuantitySI : "pixel_size" Acquisition ||--}| Detector : "detectors" BoundingBox2D ||--|o QuantitySI : "x_max" BoundingBox2D ||--|o QuantitySI : "x_min" BoundingBox2D ||--|o QuantitySI : "y_max" BoundingBox2D ||--|o QuantitySI : "y_min" Detector ||--|o QuantitySI : "dispersion" Detector ||--|o Range : "collection_angle" EnergyFilter ||--|| QuantitySI : "width_energy_filter" Range ||--|o QuantitySI : "maximal" Range ||--|o QuantitySI : "minimal" SpecialistOptics ||--|o ChromaticAberrationCorrector : "chromatic_aberration_corrector" SpecialistOptics ||--|o Phaseplate : "phaseplate" SpecialistOptics ||--|o SphericalAberrationCorrector : "spherical_aberration_corrector" Inheritance Acquisition AcquisitionSpa AcquisitionTomo Slots Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance technique 0..1 String Specifies which Acquisition subschema/class is in use direct screen_current 0..1 QuantitySI The total electron beam current hitting the viewing screen, in nA direct nominal_defocus 0..1 Range Target defocus set, min and max values in nm direct calibrated_defocus 0..1 Range Machine estimated defocus, min and max values in µm direct nominal_magnification 0..1 Integer Magnification level as indicated by the instrument, no unit direct calibrated_magnification 0..1 Integer Calculated magnification, no unit direct holder 0..1 String Speciman holder model direct holder_cryogen 0..1 String Type of cryogen used in the holder - if the holder is cooled seperately direct temperature_range 0..1 Range Temperature during data collection, in K with min and max values direct microscope_software 0..1 String Software used for given in electrons per square Angstrom from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: dose_per_movie owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI energy_filter: name: energy_filter description: Whether an energy filter was used and its specifics. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: energy_filter owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: EnergyFilter image_size: name: image_size description: The size of the image in pixels, height and width given. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: image_size owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: ImageSize date_time: name: date_time description: Time and date of the data acquisition from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: date_time owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: datetime required: true exposure_time: name: exposure_time description: Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: exposure_time owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI cryogen: name: cryogen description: Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: cryogen owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string frames_per_movie: name: frames_per_movie description: Number of frames that on average constitute a full movie, can be a bit hard to define for some detectors from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: frames_per_movie owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer grids_imaged: name: grids_imaged description: Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this data acquisition from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: grids_imaged owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer images_generated: name: images_generated description: Number of images generated total for this data collection - might need a qualifier for tilt series to determine whether full series or individual tilts are counted from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: images_generated owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer binning_camera: name: binning_camera description: Level of binning on the images applied during data collection from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: binning_camera owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: ImageSize required: true pixel_size: name: pixel_size description: Pixel size, in Angstrom from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: pixel_size owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI required: true specialist_optics: name: specialist_optics description: Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: specialist_optics owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: SpecialistOptics beamshift: name: beamshift description: Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: beamshift owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtilt: name: beamtilt description: Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: beamtilt owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D imageshift: name: imageshift description: Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detector. Given in µm. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: imageshift owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtiltgroups: name: beamtiltgroups description: Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing split dataset into groups of same tilt angle. Despite its name Beamshift is often used to achive this result. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: beamtiltgroups owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer gainref_flip_rotate: name: gainref_flip_rotate description: Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with your acquired images from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: gainref_flip_rotate owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string

docs.text: name: AcquisitionTomo from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo is_a: Acquisition slot_usage: tilt_axis_angle: name: tilt_axis_angle required: true tilt_angle: name: tilt_angle required: true attributes: tilt_axis_angle: name: tilt_axis_angle description: The tilt axis angle of a tomography series from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: tilt_axis_angle owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - AcquisitionTomo range: float required: true tilt_angle: name: tilt_angle description: The min, max and increment of the tilt angle in a tomography session. Unit is degree. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: tilt_angle owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - AcquisitionTomo range: TiltAngle required: true technique: name: technique description: Specifies which Acquisition subschema/class is in use. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: technique owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string required: false screen_current: name: screen_current description: The total electron beam current hitting the viewing screen, in nA. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: screen_current owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI nominal_defocus: name: nominal_defocus description: Target defocus set, min and max values in nm. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: nominal_defocus owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Range calibrated_defocus: name: calibrated_defocus description: Machine estimated defocus, min and max values in µm. Has a tendency to be off. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: calibrated_defocus owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Range nominal_magnification: name: nominal_magnification description: Magnification level as indicated by the instrument, no unit from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: nominal_magnification owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer calibrated_magnification: name: calibrated_magnification description: Calculated magnification, no unit from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: calibrated_magnification owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer holder: name: holder description: Speciman holder model from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: holder owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string holder_cryogen: name: holder_cryogen description: Type of cryogen used in the holder - if the holder is cooled seperately from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: holder_cryogen owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string temperature_range: name: temperature_range description: Temperature during data collection, in K with min and max values. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: temperature owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Range microscope_software: name: microscope_software description: Software used for instrument control, from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: microscope_software owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string detectors: name: detectors from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: detectors owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Detector required: true multivalued: true dose_per_movie: name: dose_per_movie description: Average dose per image/movie/tilt - given in electrons per square Angstrom from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: dose_per_movie owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI energy_filter: name: energy_filter description: Whether an energy filter was used and its specifics. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: energy_filter owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: EnergyFilter image_size: name: image_size description: The size of the image in pixels, height and width given. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: image_size owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: ImageSize date_time: name: date_time description: Time and date of the data acquisition from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: date_time owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: datetime required: true exposure_time: name: exposure_time description: Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: exposure_time owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI cryogen: name: cryogen description: Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: cryogen owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string frames_per_movie: name: frames_per_movie description: Number of frames that on average constitute a full movie, can be a bit hard to define for some detectors from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: frames_per_movie owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer grids_imaged: name: grids_imaged description: Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this data acquisition from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: grids_imaged owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer images_generated: name: images_generated description: Number of images generated total for this data collection - might need a qualifier for tilt series to determine whether full series or individual tilts are counted from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: images_generated owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer binning_camera: name: binning_camera description: Level of binning on the images applied during data collection from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: binning_camera owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: ImageSize required: true pixel_size: name: pixel_size description: Pixel size, in Angstrom from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: pixel_size owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI required: true specialist_optics: name: specialist_optics description: Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: specialist_optics owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: SpecialistOptics beamshift: name: beamshift description: Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: beamshift owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtilt: name: beamtilt description: Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: beamtilt owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D imageshift: name: imageshift description: Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detector. Given in µm. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: imageshift owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtiltgroups: name: beamtiltgroups description: Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing split dataset into groups of same tilt angle. Despite its name Beamshift is often used to achive this result. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: beamtiltgroups owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer gainref_flip_rotate: name: gainref_flip_rotate description: Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with your acquired images from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-env-tomo rank: 1000 alias: gainref_flip_rotate owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string

docs.text: oscem-schemas-general Schema for the Open Standards Community for Electron Microscopy (OSC-EM) URI: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-general Name: General Classes Class Description Acquisition General acquisition covering materials science and other use cases AcquisitionSpa Any Any type, used as the base for type-narrowing BoundingBox2D an axis-aligned 2D bounding box (float units) ChromaticAberrationCorrector Special device used to correct instrument inherent chromatic aberration Descriptor List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how mi... Descriptors Detector Class representing a detector EMDatasetBase OSC-EM Metadata for a dataset EMDatasetGeneral General dataset for TEM/STEM and EELS/EDX spectroscopy EnergyFilter A device used to filter for electrons with specific energy Funder Description of the project funding Grant Grant Grid Details on the grid used in the experiment ImageSize size of a 2D image (in integer units) Instrument Instrument values, mostly constant across a data collection Ligand Information on ligands if present Microscope Microscope information Molecule More detailed information about individual molecules Organizational Overarching category for authors and grants OverallMolecule Description of the overall molecule Person personal information Author Details on the person performing the experiment Phaseplate Used to modulate the phase of the electron wave QuantityValue if a value has a unit, it should be given as a unit value pair QuantitySI unit value extended to have two additional fields si_value and si_unit Range A range constructed from min and max Series A series of numbers constructed from min, max, and increment Sample Unifying class to describe the full sample SampleMolecular SpecialistOptics Optional optics used to correct for instrument limitations Specimen Description of specimen handling SphericalAberrationCorrector Special device used to correct instrument inherent spherical aberration Slots Slot Description acceleration_voltage Voltage used for the electron acceleration, in kV acquisition assembly What type of higher order structure your sample forms - if any authors List of authors associated with the project beam_convergence Refers to how tightly or widely the electron beam is focused onto the sample,... beamshift Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does ... beamtilt Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes th... beamtiltgroups Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing ... binning_camera Level of binning on the images applied during data collection budget budget buffer Name/composition of the (chemical) sample buffer during grid preparation c2_aperture C2 aperture size used in data acquisition, in µm calibrated_defocus Machine estimated defocus, min and max values in µm calibrated_magnification Calculated magnification, no unit chromatic_aberration_corrector Specialist device to correct for chromatic aberration of the microscope lense... collection_angle Collection angle set, min and max values in mrad concentration Concentration of the (supra)molecule in the sample, in mg/ml country Country of the institution cryogen Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen cs Spherical aberration of the instrument, in mm date_time Time and date of the data acquisition description The description of the item descriptor_name Name defining the descriptor descriptor_thing Description of the descriptor descriptors List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how mo... detectors dispersion Dispersion of an analytical detector, in eV dose_per_movie Average dose per image/movie/tilt - given in electrons per square Angstrom electron_source Type of electron source used in the microscope, such as FEG email email embedding Whether the sample was embedded end_date end date energy_filter Whether an energy filter was used and its specifics exposure_time Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s expression_system Scientific name of the organism used to produce the molecule of interest family_name last name film_material Type of material the support film is made of film_support Whether a support film was used film_thickness Thickness of the support film film_topology Topology of the support film frames_per_movie Number of frames that on average constitute a full movie, can be a bit hard t... funder funding organization/person funder_name funding organization/person gainref_flip_rotate Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with... gene_name Name of the gene of interest given_name first name grant_name name of the grant grants List of grants associated with the project grid Description of the grid used grids_imaged Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this dat... height The height of a given item - unit depends on item holder Speciman holder model holder_cryogen Type of cryogen used in the holder - if the holder is cooled seperately humidity Environmental humidity just before vitrification, in % illumination Mode of illumination used during data collection image_size The size of the image in pixels, height and width given images_generated Number of images generated total for this data collection - might need a qual... imageshift Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detec... imaging Mode of imaging used during data collection increment Increment between elements of a series instrument instrument_type Details of a given specialist instrument job_title job title ligands List of ligands associated with the sample manufacturer The name of the manufacturer material Material out of which the grid is made maximal Maximal value of a given dataset property mesh Grid mesh in lines per inch microscope Microscope information microscope_software Software used for instrument control, minimal Minimal value of a given dataset property mode Mode of the detector, e model The model of the item molecular_class Class of the molecule molecular_overall_type Description of the overall molecular type, i molecular_type Description of the overall molecular type, i molecular_weight Molecular weight in Da molecule List of molecule associated with the sample name The name of the item name_mol Name of an individual molecule (often protein) in the sample name_org Name of the organization name_sample Name of the full sample natural_source Scientific name of the natural host organism nominal_defocus Target defocus set, min and max values in nm nominal_magnification Magnification level as indicated by the instrument, no unit operating_mode Operating mode of the microscope, i orcid ORCID of the author, a type of unique identifier organizational overall_molecule Description of the overall molecule person person ph pH of the sample buffer phaseplate Phaseplate is a special optics device that can be used to enhance contrast pixel_size Pixel size, in Angstrom present Whether the model contains any ligands pretreatment_atmosphere Atmospheric conditions in the chamber during pretreatment, i pretreatment_pressure Pressure of the chamber during pretreatment, in Pa pretreatment_time Length of time of the pretreatment in s pretreatment_type Type of pretreatment of the grid, i project_id project id reference Link to a reference of your ligand, i role Role of the author, for example principal investigator sample screen_current The total electron beam current hitting the viewing screen, in nA sequence Full sequence of the sample as in the data, i shadowing Whether the sample was shadowed smiles Provide a valid SMILES string of your ligand source Where the sample was taken from, i specialist_optics Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate specimen Description of the specimen spherical_aberration_corrector Specialist device to correct for spherical aberration of the microscope lense... staining Whether the sample was stained start_date start date taxonomy_id_expression Taxonomy ID of the expression system organism taxonomy_id_source Taxonomy ID of the natural source organism technique Specifies which Acquisition subschema/class is in use telephone work phone temperature Environmental temperature just before vitrification, in K temperature_range Temperature during data collection, in K with min and max values type_org Type of organization, academic, commercial, governmental, etc unit the unit of a given value unitSI the SI unit attached to a si value used whether a specific instrument was used during data acquisition value the value of a field with a unit valueSI value of a given field in respect to its SI unit vitrification Whether the sample was vitrified vitrification_cryogen Which cryogen was used for vitrification width The width of a given item - unit depends on item width_energy_filter Width of the energy filter used x_max maximum x x_min minimum x y_max maximum y y_min minimum y Enumerations Enumeration Description AcquisitionTechnique AssemblyEnum Allowed molecular assembly values - compatible with the EMDB MoleculeClassEnum Allowed molecule class values - compatible with the EMDB OrganizationTypeEnum Allowed values for authors organizations Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description

microscope_software Software used for instrument control, minimal Minimal value of a given dataset property mode Mode of the detector, e model The model of the item molecular_class Class of the molecule molecular_overall_type Description of the overall molecular type, i molecular_type Description of the overall molecular type, i molecular_weight Molecular weight in Da molecule List of molecule associated with the sample name The name of the item name_mol Name of an individual molecule (often protein) in the sample name_org Name of the organization name_sample Name of the full sample natural_source Scientific name of the natural host organism nominal_defocus Target defocus set, min and max values in nm nominal_magnification Magnification level as indicated by the instrument, no unit operating_mode Operating mode of the microscope, i orcid ORCID of the author, a type of unique identifier organizational overall_molecule Description of the overall molecule person person ph pH of the sample buffer phaseplate Phaseplate is a special optics device that can be used to enhance contrast pixel_size Pixel size, in Angstrom present Whether the model contains any ligands pretreatment_atmosphere Atmospheric conditions in the chamber during pretreatment, i pretreatment_pressure Pressure of the chamber during pretreatment, in Pa pretreatment_time Length of time of the pretreatment in s pretreatment_type Type of pretreatment of the grid, i project_id project id reference Link to a reference of your ligand, i role Role of the author, for example principal investigator sample screen_current The total electron beam current hitting the viewing screen, in nA sequence Full sequence of the sample as in the data, i shadowing Whether the sample was shadowed smiles Provide a valid SMILES string of your ligand source Where the sample was taken from, i specialist_optics Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate specimen Description of the specimen spherical_aberration_corrector Specialist device to correct for spherical aberration of the microscope lense... staining Whether the sample was stained start_date start date taxonomy_id_expression Taxonomy ID of the expression system organism taxonomy_id_source Taxonomy ID of the natural source organism technique Specifies which Acquisition subschema/class is in use telephone work phone temperature Environmental temperature just before vitrification, in K temperature_range Temperature during data collection, in K with min and max values type_org Type of organization, academic, commercial, governmental, etc unit the unit of a given value unitSI the SI unit attached to a si value used whether a specific instrument was used during data acquisition value the value of a field with a unit valueSI value of a given field in respect to its SI unit vitrification Whether the sample was vitrified vitrification_cryogen Which cryogen was used for vitrification width The width of a given item - unit depends on item width_energy_filter Width of the energy filter used x_max maximum x x_min minimum x y_max maximum y y_min minimum y

Acquisition range: integer binning_camera: name: binning_camera description: Level of binning on the images applied during data collection from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-general rank: 1000 alias: binning_camera owner: AcquisitionSpa domain_of: - Acquisition range: ImageSize required: true pixel_size: name: pixel_size description: Pixel size, in Angstrom from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-general rank: 1000 alias: pixel_size owner: AcquisitionSpa domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI required: true specialist_optics: name: specialist_optics description: Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-general rank: 1000 alias: specialist_optics owner: AcquisitionSpa domain_of: - Acquisition range: SpecialistOptics beamshift: name: beamshift description: Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-general rank: 1000 alias: beamshift owner: AcquisitionSpa domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtilt: name: beamtilt description: Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-general rank: 1000 alias: beamtilt owner: AcquisitionSpa domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D imageshift: name: imageshift description: Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detector. Given in µm. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-general rank: 1000 alias: imageshift owner: AcquisitionSpa domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtiltgroups: name: beamtiltgroups description: Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing split dataset into groups of same tilt angle. Despite its name Beamshift is often used to achive this result. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-general rank: 1000 alias: beamtiltgroups owner: AcquisitionSpa domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer gainref_flip_rotate: name: gainref_flip_rotate description: Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with your acquired images from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-general rank: 1000 alias: gainref_flip_rotate owner: AcquisitionSpa domain_of: - Acquisition range: string

docs.text: oscem-schemas-subtomo Schema for the Open Standards Community for Electron Microscopy (OSC-EM) URI: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo Name: SubtomogramAveraging Classes Class Description Acquisition General acquisition covering materials science and other use cases AcquisitionSpa AcquisitionTomo AcquisitionCelTomo AcquisitionEnvTomo AcquisitionSubTomo Any Any type, used as the base for type-narrowing BoundingBox2D an axis-aligned 2D bounding box (float units) ChromaticAberrationCorrector Special device used to correct instrument inherent chromatic aberration Descriptor List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how mi... Descriptors Detector Class representing a detector EMDatasetBase OSC-EM Metadata for a dataset EMDatasetTomo Cryo electron tomography dataset, with a focus on a single protein (complex) ... EnergyFilter A device used to filter for electrons with specific energy Funder Description of the project funding Grant Grant Grid Details on the grid used in the experiment ImageSize size of a 2D image (in integer units) Instrument Instrument values, mostly constant across a data collection Ligand Information on ligands if present Microscope Microscope information Molecule More detailed information about individual molecules Organizational Overarching category for authors and grants OverallMolecule Description of the overall molecule Person personal information Author Details on the person performing the experiment Phaseplate Used to modulate the phase of the electron wave QuantityValue if a value has a unit, it should be given as a unit value pair QuantitySI unit value extended to have two additional fields si_value and si_unit Range A range constructed from min and max Series A series of numbers constructed from min, max, and increment TiltAngle The min, max and increment of the tilt angle in a tomography session Sample Unifying class to describe the full sample SampleMolecular SpecialistOptics Optional optics used to correct for instrument limitations Specimen Description of specimen handling SphericalAberrationCorrector Special device used to correct instrument inherent spherical aberration Slots Slot Description acceleration_voltage Voltage used for the electron acceleration, in kV acquisition assembly What type of higher order structure your sample forms - if any authors List of authors associated with the project beam_convergence Refers to how tightly or widely the electron beam is focused onto the sample,... beamshift Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does ... beamtilt Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes th... beamtiltgroups Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing ... binning_camera Level of binning on the images applied during data collection budget budget buffer Name/composition of the (chemical) sample buffer during grid preparation c2_aperture C2 aperture size used in data acquisition, in µm calibrated_defocus Machine estimated defocus, min and max values in µm calibrated_magnification Calculated magnification, no unit chromatic_aberration_corrector Specialist device to correct for chromatic aberration of the microscope lense... collection_angle Collection angle set, min and max values in mrad concentration Concentration of the (supra)molecule in the sample, in mg/ml country Country of the institution cryogen Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen cs Spherical aberration of the instrument, in mm date_time Time and date of the data acquisition description The description of the item descriptor_name Name defining the descriptor descriptor_thing Description of the descriptor descriptors List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how mo... detectors dispersion Dispersion of an analytical detector, in eV dose_per_movie Average dose per image/movie/tilt - given in electrons per square Angstrom electron_source Type of electron source used in the microscope, such as FEG email email embedding Whether the sample was embedded end_date end date energy_filter Whether an energy filter was used and its specifics exposure_time Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s expression_system Scientific name of the organism used to produce the molecule of interest family_name last name film_material Type of material the support film is made of film_support Whether a support film was used film_thickness Thickness of the support film film_topology Topology of the support film frames_per_movie Number of frames that on average constitute a full movie, can be a bit hard t... funder funding organization/person funder_name funding organization/person gainref_flip_rotate Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with... gene_name Name of the gene of interest given_name first name grant_name name of the grant grants List of grants associated with the project grid Description of the grid used grids_imaged Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this dat... height The height of a given item - unit depends on item holder Speciman holder model holder_cryogen Type of cryogen used in the holder - if the holder is cooled seperately humidity Environmental humidity just before vitrification, in % illumination Mode of illumination used during data collection image_size The size of the image in pixels, height and width given images_generated Number of images generated total for this data collection - might need a qual... imageshift Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detec... imaging Mode of imaging used during data collection increment Increment between elements of a series instrument instrument_type Details of a given specialist instrument job_title job title ligands List of ligands associated with the sample manufacturer The name of the manufacturer material Material out of which the grid is made maximal Maximal value of a given dataset property mesh Grid mesh in lines per inch microscope Microscope information microscope_software Software used for instrument control, minimal Minimal value of a given dataset property mode Mode of the detector, e model The model of the item molecular_class Class of the molecule molecular_overall_type Description of the overall molecular type, i molecular_type Description of the overall molecular type, i molecular_weight Molecular weight in Da molecule List of molecule associated with the sample name The name of the item name_mol Name of an individual molecule (often protein) in the sample name_org Name of the organization name_sample Name of the full sample natural_source Scientific name of the natural host organism nominal_defocus Target defocus set, min and max values in nm nominal_magnification Magnification level as indicated by the instrument, no unit operating_mode Operating mode of the microscope, i orcid ORCID of the author, a type of unique identifier organizational overall_molecule Description of the overall molecule person person ph pH of the sample buffer phaseplate Phaseplate is a special optics device that can be used to enhance contrast pixel_size Pixel size, in Angstrom present Whether the model contains any ligands pretreatment_atmosphere Atmospheric conditions in the chamber during pretreatment, i pretreatment_pressure Pressure of the chamber during pretreatment, in Pa pretreatment_time Length of time of the pretreatment in s pretreatment_type Type of pretreatment of the grid, i project_id project id reference Link to a reference of your ligand, i role Role of the author, for example principal investigator sample screen_current The total electron beam current hitting the viewing screen, in nA sequence Full sequence of the sample as in the data, i shadowing Whether the sample was shadowed smiles Provide a valid SMILES string of your ligand source Where the sample was taken from, i specialist_optics Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate specimen Description of the specimen spherical_aberration_corrector Specialist device to correct for spherical aberration of the microscope lense... staining Whether the sample was stained start_date start date taxonomy_id_expression Taxonomy ID of the expression system organism taxonomy_id_source Taxonomy ID of the natural source organism technique Specifies which Acquisition subschema/class is in use telephone work phone temperature Environmental temperature just before vitrification, in K temperature_range Temperature during data collection, in K with min and max values tilt_angle The min, max and increment of the tilt angle in a tomography session tilt_axis_angle The tilt axis angle of a tomography series type_org Type of organization, academic, commercial, governmental, etc unit the unit of a given value unitSI the SI unit attached to a si value used whether a specific instrument was used during data acquisition value the value of a field with a unit valueSI value of a given field in respect to its SI unit vitrification Whether the sample was vitrified vitrification_cryogen Which cryogen was used for vitrification width The width of a given item - unit depends on item width_energy_filter Width of the energy filter used x_max maximum x x_min minimum x y_max maximum y y_min minimum y Enumerations Enumeration Description AcquisitionTechnique AssemblyEnum Allowed molecular assembly values - compatible with the EMDB MoleculeClassEnum Allowed molecule class values - compatible with the EMDB OrganizationTypeEnum Allowed values for authors organizations Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... docs.text: Class: Acquisition General acquisition covering materials science and other use cases. For specialized techniques, use the appropriate subclass (AcquisitionSpa for single particle, or tomography subclasses). Acquisition range: integer binning_camera: name: binning_camera description: Level of binning on the images applied during data collection from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: binning_camera owner: AcquisitionCelTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: datetime required: true exposure_time: name: exposure_time description: Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: exposure_time owner: AcquisitionEnvTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI cryogen: name: cryogen description: Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: cryogen owner: AcquisitionEnvTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer grids_imaged: name: grids_imaged description: Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this data acquisition from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: grids_imaged owner: AcquisitionEnvTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: SpecialistOptics beamshift: name: beamshift description: Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Has a tendency to be off. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: calibrated_defocus owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Range nominal_magnification: name: nominal_magnification description: Magnification level as indicated by the instrument, no unit from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: nominal_magnification owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer calibrated_magnification: name: calibrated_magnification description: Calculated magnification, no unit from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: calibrated_magnification owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer holder: name: holder description: Speciman holder model from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: holder owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string holder_cryogen: name: holder_cryogen description: Type of cryogen used in the holder - if the holder is cooled seperately from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: holder_cryogen owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string temperature_range: name: temperature_range description: Temperature during data collection, in K with min and max values. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: temperature owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Range microscope_software: name: microscope_software description: Software used for instrument control, from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: microscope_software owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string detectors: name: detectors from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: detectors owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Detector required: true multivalued: true dose_per_movie: name: dose_per_movie description: Average dose per image/movie/tilt - given in electrons per square Angstrom from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: dose_per_movie owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI energy_filter: name: energy_filter description: Whether an energy filter was used and its specifics. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: energy_filter owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: EnergyFilter image_size: name: image_size description: The size of the image in pixels, height and width given. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: image_size owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: ImageSize date_time: name: date_time description: Time and date of the data acquisition from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: date_time owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: datetime required: true exposure_time: name: exposure_time description: Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: exposure_time owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI cryogen: name: cryogen description: Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: cryogen owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string frames_per_movie: name: frames_per_movie description: Number of frames that on average constitute a full movie, can be a bit hard to define for some detectors from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: frames_per_movie owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer grids_imaged: name: grids_imaged description: Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this data acquisition from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: grids_imaged owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer images_generated: name: images_generated description: Number of images generated total for this data collection - might need a qualifier for tilt series to determine whether full series or individual tilts are counted from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: images_generated owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer binning_camera: name: binning_camera description: Level of binning on the images applied during data collection from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: binning_camera owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: ImageSize required: true pixel_size: name: pixel_size description: Pixel size, in Angstrom from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: pixel_size owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI required: true specialist_optics: name: specialist_optics description: Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: specialist_optics owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: SpecialistOptics beamshift: name: beamshift description: Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: beamshift owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtilt: name: beamtilt description: Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: beamtilt owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D imageshift: name: imageshift description: Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detector. Given in µm. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: imageshift owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtiltgroups: name: beamtiltgroups description: Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing split dataset into groups of same tilt angle. Despite its name Beamshift is often used to achive this result. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: beamtiltgroups owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer gainref_flip_rotate: name: gainref_flip_rotate description: Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with your acquired images from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: gainref_flip_rotate owner: AcquisitionSubTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string

Unit is degree. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: tilt_angle owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - AcquisitionTomo range: TiltAngle required: true technique: name: technique description: Specifies which Acquisition subschema/class is in use. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: technique owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string required: false screen_current: name: screen_current description: The total electron beam current hitting the viewing screen, in nA. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: screen_current owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI nominal_defocus: name: nominal_defocus description: Target defocus set, min and max values in nm. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: nominal_defocus owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Range calibrated_defocus: name: calibrated_defocus description: Machine estimated defocus, min and max values in µm. Has a tendency to be off. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: calibrated_defocus owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Range nominal_magnification: name: nominal_magnification description: Magnification level as indicated by the instrument, no unit from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: nominal_magnification owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer calibrated_magnification: name: calibrated_magnification description: Calculated magnification, no unit from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: calibrated_magnification owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer holder: name: holder description: Speciman holder model from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: holder owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string holder_cryogen: name: holder_cryogen description: Type of cryogen used in the holder - if the holder is cooled seperately from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: holder_cryogen owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string temperature_range: name: temperature_range description: Temperature during data collection, in K with min and max values. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: temperature owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Range microscope_software: name: microscope_software description: Software used for instrument control, from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: microscope_software owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string detectors: name: detectors from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: detectors owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: Detector required: true multivalued: true dose_per_movie: name: dose_per_movie description: Average dose per image/movie/tilt - given in electrons per square Angstrom from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: dose_per_movie owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI energy_filter: name: energy_filter description: Whether an energy filter was used and its specifics. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: energy_filter owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: EnergyFilter image_size: name: image_size description: The size of the image in pixels, height and width given. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: image_size owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: ImageSize date_time: name: date_time description: Time and date of the data acquisition from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: date_time owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: datetime required: true exposure_time: name: exposure_time description: Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: exposure_time owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI cryogen: name: cryogen description: Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: cryogen owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string frames_per_movie: name: frames_per_movie description: Number of frames that on average constitute a full movie, can be a bit hard to define for some detectors from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: frames_per_movie owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer grids_imaged: name: grids_imaged description: Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this data acquisition from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: grids_imaged owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer images_generated: name: images_generated description: Number of images generated total for this data collection - might need a qualifier for tilt series to determine whether full series or individual tilts are counted from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: images_generated owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer binning_camera: name: binning_camera description: Level of binning on the images applied during data collection from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: binning_camera owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: ImageSize required: true pixel_size: name: pixel_size description: Pixel size, in Angstrom from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: pixel_size owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: QuantitySI required: true specialist_optics: name: specialist_optics description: Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: specialist_optics owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: SpecialistOptics beamshift: name: beamshift description: Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: beamshift owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtilt: name: beamtilt description: Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: beamtilt owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D imageshift: name: imageshift description: Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detector. Given in µm. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: imageshift owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: BoundingBox2D beamtiltgroups: name: beamtiltgroups description: Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing split dataset into groups of same tilt angle. Despite its name Beamshift is often used to achive this result. from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: beamtiltgroups owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: integer gainref_flip_rotate: name: gainref_flip_rotate description: Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with your acquired images from_schema: https://w3id.org/oscem-schemas/latest/oscem-schemas-subtomo rank: 1000 alias: gainref_flip_rotate owner: AcquisitionTomo domain_of: - Acquisition range: string
